image_description: A cartoon illustration of musical notes of different colors floating together to form a continuous musical staff. The notes are brightly colored in shades of blue, pink and yellow. They have smiling faces and little arms and legs as they join together. The style is fun and whimsical.
image_phrases: smiling musical notes, bright colors, whimsical style, comes together into staff
body_texts: This page explains how the selected music pieces from the movie soundtrack are woven together into a full immersive soundtrack for the book. The emotion-matching and scene-matching excerpts are seamlessly joined into a continuous musical experience. The aim is to construct an uninterrupted soundtrack that enhances the reading journey.
